explain: making very little or no sound
to move something away from you
to move something closer to you
the way in which an object may face or travel
to undo a knot or make something loose
not telling the truth; not honest
statement: Big dogs bark loudly. Small dogs do not make such loud noises.
A lizard is a very quiet pet.
The fish food was lightly sprinkled on top of the water.
My dad used force to move the heavy box.
I push the door to close it.
I pull the drawer to open it.
A swing moves in opposite directions.
Can you retell the story you just heard?
The waiter came to refill my glass of water.
Please untie the ribbon on the gift box.
The dishonest boy told lies to his teacher.
